english.0: The restoration of the Ghent Altarpiece started back in 2012 and was open every week for visitors.
english.1: this is another did you know
english.6: X-radiography can detect traces of minerals and other elements within a painting. These traces can be clues to when the painting was executed and where.
english.7: Technical examination such as x-ray can reveal the extend of old damages on the painting now concealed by a past restoration.
english.8: The technique of x-radiography was applied to the examination of paintings shortly after the discovery of x-rays by Wilhelm Röntgen in 1895.
